select app.uuid , app.amount , app.app_date , app.app_level , app.app_no , app.app_org , bs.sub_name as app_org_name , app.app_per , u1.name as app_per_name , app.app_state , app.approval_per1 , u2.name as approval_per1_name , app.approval_per_comment1 , app.approval_per2 , u3.name as approval_per2_name , app.approval_per_comment2 , app.approval_per3 , u4.name as approval_per3_name , app.approval_per_comment3 , app.payment_explain , app.payment_mode , app.payment_period , app.reason , app.confirm_amount from t_petty_cash_app app LEFT JOIN t_user u1 ON app.app_per = u1.uuid LEFT JOIN t_user u2 ON app.approval_per1 = u2.uuid LEFT JOIN t_user u3 ON app.approval_per2 = u3.uuid LEFT JOIN t_user u4 ON app.approval_per3 = u4.uuid LEFT JOIN t_budget_subject bs ON app.app_org = bs.uuid
app.uuid = #{uuid}
